snippet.title: Halo 3: Combat Evolved 1.0 Update is out NOW!
snippet.description:
This is Halo 3: Combat Evolved's BIGGEST update yet! This update adds The Truth & Reconciliation campain mission, Danger Canyon and Chasm 34 multiplayer maps and the Hangar A-2 firefight map, a WHOLE lot of fixes and polish and takes advantage of MCC's latest update which lets modders enable the motion sensor and create Multiplayer maps for ODST (which Halo 3: Combat Evolved is now running on).

Download & Play now:  https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2899334556

#Halo3  #HaloMods #HaloMCC #Mods

Thanks to:
Odusgu
Concasico Woodworks
Mr Walrusman

for being channel members and thanks to:

BotBruh
TurboSimp
ThatOneGuy
Weaver900
Kris Footew
Jacob Brooker
Fletcher Kinnear
Gilbert Busque
Black Dahaka
Nicolas Crinon
DJ
Samer Deeb
Sparman 117
Jon Basniak
Ryan Thomas
xkcerberus

for being patreon subscribers! All of your support means a lot to me! :)

Want to support the channel? Consider joining as a member or subscribing to my Patreon page! :)
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoW_EFIY3kskjV2howbuXvw/join
https://www.patreon.com/Kashiiera
